Absorb Elements

traits.label: Arcane Recovery
traits.description: You may recover spell slots with a combined level of half your wizard level (rounded up) excluding 6th level or higher slots
traits.frequency: Once per day, after a short rest

traits.label: 2nd Level Spells
traits.description:
Flaming Sphere
Hold Person
Mirror Image

traits.label: Sculpt Spells
traits.description: When you cast an evocation spell that affects other creatures you can see, you can choose a number of them equal to 1 + the spell's level. The chosen creatures automatically succeed their saving throw and take no damage

traits.label: Evocation Savant
traits.description: The gold and time you must spend to copy an evocation spell into your spellbook is halved

traits.label: Potent Cantrip
traits.description: When a creature saves against your cantrips, the creature takes half the cantrip's damage but no other effect

traits.label: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60ft of you as bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light

traits.label: Dwarven Resilience
traits.description: Advantage on saves against poison and resistance to poison damage

traits.label: Stone Cunning
traits.description: History checks related to stonework add double proficiency

traits.label: Dwarven Toughness
traits.description: You gain 1 maximum life per level

personality: I connect everything that happens to me to a grand cosmic plan
ideals: Solitude and comtemplation are paths toward mystical or magical power
bonds: I'm still seeking the enlightenment I pursued in my seclusion, and it still eludes me
flaws: I'd risk too much to uncover a lost bit of knowledge
